math

Class Tank

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.Tank

  • public class Tank
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that mathematically represents an entire tank
    Version:
    5/17/18
    Author:
    Nikash Walia, Roopak Phatak, Maithreyee Vatsan, Period: 2, Assignment- Tanks, Sources: None

      Reduces the number of hitpoints of the tank

      Checks if the tank has collided with a bullet

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tank

        public Tank(int x,
            int y,
            int z,
            double angle,
            int gunLength,
            int gunWidth,
            int gunHeight,
            int baseLength,
            int baseWidth,
            int baseHeight,
            int hp)
        Constructor for Tank
        Parameters:
        x - starting x-coordinate of base
        y - starting y-coordinate of base
        z - starting z-coordinate of base
        angle - starting angle of base and gun
        gunLength - length of gun
        gunWidth - width of gun
        gunHeight - height of gun
        baseLength - length of base
        baseWidth - width of base
        baseHeight - height of base
        hp - hitpoints of base
